storyInfo: After the Volsinii incident, Lavinia temporarily takes in Luna, Rubio's daughter... but the girl's condition worries her...

attributes.content: I'm back.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...Luna? Are you there?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: There's no response from inside the room, but Lavinia looks around and finds who she's looking for at the desk in the corner.
The table is stacked with books that have been read, and sleeping at the center of the books is the girl hunched over at the desk.
Luna.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Hmm... Huh?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Sorry, did I wake you?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I... fell asleep?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: You sure did.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I finished this book today, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I read the notes you wrote in it, and left my own comments too.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: That's amazing. It took me a month to get through that one when I was a student, but you only took a week.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I thought I may as well study at home since I don't have a school to go to anymore.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I'm sorry... The new city still needs some time to sort out its resources, particularly education.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'll make sure you get enrolled in a new one as soon as I can.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's not your fault.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: After what padre did, I didn't want to go to that school anymore anyway.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I should be thanking you instead, Lavinia. For taking me in.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I promised him I would. Besides, there's no way I could just watch Segretario Rubio's daughter live out on the streets.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...Actually, I don't care if I can't go back to school.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I mean, everyone already knows I'm his daughter.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: ...You had a long study session. You should take a break. I'll make dinner.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's fine, I'm not tired. I'll help you out.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: ...Do you know why I know how to cook?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Padre used to do two things as Segretario di Sicurezza Alimentare. Walk around the markets, and cook for the famiglie.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: When he cooked for the famiglie, he usually had to keep his guests company so he couldn't cook for me and mamma.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Mamma didn't like to cook, so he taught me how.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: And I was usually the one who made our meals.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I used to scold padre in my head whenever I cooked.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I still do.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: The kitchen knife streaks across the moist scallions as it makes contact with the chopping board.
Stupid idiot... Why did he have to do that...
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Are you still unwilling to forgive him?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Does it matter? He's not coming back anyways.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: ...It's alright, Luna.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'll be with you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Sorry... I... I... don't know.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: ...We'll visit Famiglia Saluzzo tomorrow and put an end to this.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You are his daughter, so legally you have the right to do this.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Though I won't force you to go if you don't want to.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...I'm going.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Padre was stupid, but I'd feel bad letting the Saluzzos keep his body.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: You want a proper end to this whole thing too, right?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Whatever our reasons may be, the Saluzzos still owe us an explanation.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The famous magnanimous judge of Volsinii is gracing us with a visit today?
I thought I'd find Don Alberto here.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The Don is no longer in Volsinii.
But he did expect someone to come asking for Rubio's body, so he specially instructed us to offer you our hospitality.
Though I didn't think you'd bring little Luna along.
...I've seen you before. You used to work under mio padre.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: You remember me? Wonderful. Just call me Teresa.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: So you're part of the Saluzzos?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Yes, and it was no secret to Rubio.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Don't worry, Signorina Lavinia. The Don emphasized that we must wrap this matter up nicely.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Do you think it's 'nice' for us to have to personally knock on your door to get Segretario Rubio's body?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: How could you say that?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: His death was extremely troublesome for us, you know.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Oh, my apologies, dear. I didn't mean to hurt your feelings.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: He was a very friendly boss to work under; everyone thought so. We were all upset by his death as well.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: We didn't come here to talk about this.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But Your Honor, wouldn't you agree with me?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: His speech may have been quite moving, and even today I can still hear that gunshot going off.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: But... it's been a while since then, and nothing has changed.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: It seems to me everything's the same as ever.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: The only thing that's different is a child lost her father.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Have you been well, dear?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: ...Lavinia takes good care of me.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Good, good to hear.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: However, Her Honor is a VIP in our new city with many affairs to tend to, so I don't see her having free time to play with you.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: *sigh* How callous of your father. To throw you away along with his own life, all for nothing.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: You think padre died for nothing?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I don't want to lie to you.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Let's say we hand over the reins of the new city to that Bellone boy and our dear judge here. What could they possibly achieve?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Your Honor, do you truly believe you can build a city free of the famiglie?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: We did not come here to debate with you, Signorina Teresa. Only to retrieve her father's body.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Of course, of course.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Bring them both to Rubio's remains.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Come with me, you two.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Don't let her get to you, Luna.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: She's just trying to provoke us.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Can you really say that, Signorina?
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Shouldn't you know better than anyone the weight of what she was saying?
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: It doesn't matter what you or Signor Leontuzzo think of your own capabilities. Your goals just seem so ridiculous.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: You can't possibly think to defeat the famiglie with a slogan or two. Or do you really think Signora Sicilia likes you that much?
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: You think padre died for nothing?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I don't want to lie to you.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Let's say we hand over the reins of the new city to that Bellone boy and our dear judge here. What could they possibly achieve?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Your Honor, do you truly believe you can build a city free of the famiglie?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: (Muttering) I'm sorry, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Of course you wouldn't understand. 'Fairness' is not a word in a mafioso's dictionary.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: We may have to borrow Signora Sicilia's power for now, but we will prove to her that we won't need it forever.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Bold words, but the girl doesn't seem to agree.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso
Lavinia
attributes.content: Luna...

attributes.name: Lavinia
attributes.content: Luna?
Where is she?!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Kill some time with us, Signorina.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: WHAT DID YOU DO TO HER?!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Oh, don't get the wrong idea. We didn't touch her; she left you on her own.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Our job is just to stop you from finding her.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: I knew you'd be back.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: My dear little Luna.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Come, let's talk. About your padre.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: What are you talking about...?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Did you really think the Saluzzos would leave things be?
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: All of us detest the Bellones. And you. And Rubio.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: So you devised this scheme to threaten me, with Luna as a hostage?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Threaten?
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: *tsk* *tsk* I see you still don't know us well enough, Signorina.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: We know people like you. We could kill someone you love right before your eyes, and you wouldn't even consider revenge.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: So more... unusual methods are required.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Our little Luna should be with Teresa by now.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: You mean‚Äî
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You dare‚Äî?!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Haha. Bingo, Your Honor.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: I don't get it. How?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: How can you talk about padre's death so lightly?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Because life and death are everyday matters for us.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: One day you're telling a joke, and the next you're gone forever.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: You get used to it.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: I don't want to.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Then you might just join the ones who disappear for good.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: That gunshot may have caused some misconceptions, and you might have thought your father died a hero.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: But give it a few days, months, years‚Äîwill anyone actually remember what he did?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: The sound of the rain silences everything, eventually.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Lavinia said she'll remember, and some other people too. That's enough.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: And you believe her?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: If you really, truly do‚Äîif you don't doubt her at all... then why did you come to me?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: You do have doubts, don't you?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Even if Rubio's wish can come true, how much time will it take?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Can you afford to wait that long?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Or perhaps I should be asking: Are you willing to wait, my dear?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: I‚Äî
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Let's be serious, ragazzina.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: You don't actually understand what Rubio was talking about.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: You don't care either. How could you, at your age?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Honestly, shouldn't the target of your hate be our dear judge instead?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: She lied to you.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: About being patient. That what Rubio said could come true. I mean, consider this... what if she was the one who made him do all that in the first place?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: How much more blood will be spilled on the streets, all for our righteous lady of justice's ideals?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: I won't let you talk about her that way!
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: But you do have doubts, no?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Let's make a deal then, shall we?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: I'll hand over your father's corpse to Signorina Lavinia.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: We only ask that you put in some nice words for us in any subsequent court hearings.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Rubio killed himself. Saluzzo had nothing to do with his suicide.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: ...Just how much do you have to belittle mio padre and Lavinia until you're satisfied?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Belittle? I'm just stating the facts.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: I mean, do you not loathe your father for leaving you behind?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: You're wrong‚Äî
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I do hate him for dying on his own and leaving me behind.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: But I also know I should hate you guys even more.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: The famiglia who drove him to his death!!!
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Luna rips her backpack open to grab her hidden crossbow, and aims it at Teresa.
Teresa meets the cold crossbow bolt with a smile.
From the very start... you planned to lure Luna into killing Teresa.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Are you people mad?! Willingly sending one of your own to die?!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Mad? Us?
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: To us, Rubio was the madman.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: He dragged us all down for his insane, impossible fantasy.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: You don't know the first thing about Segretario Rubio!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You're right, we have no idea what he was talking about. But we do know how to deal with people like you.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Relax, we have no plans to rub you out. But you better not get any ideas about finding the girl either.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Just sit tight here till it's all over, and then we can go get Teresa's body.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Why?! Is Teresa that willing to throw her life away?!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: She was pretty unlucky to be Rubio's subordinate.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: But when she dies, her brother and their useless father will get to live.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: And she'll bring glory to the famiglia.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: If everything goes nicely, little Luna may even be able to fill her shoes in future. Wouldn't that be nice?
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Luna is innocent!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You had Bellone backing you in the past so we could only turn a blind eye to your antics.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: But the Bellones are history now. Old Bernado's dead. So did you really think we'd just let you do as you please?
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: You were the main target all along.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: So if you want to blame someone, Signorina, blame yourself. You shouldn't have taken her in. A truly terrible decision.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Out of my way‚Äî
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: *tsk* Truly a judge who strikes fear in the famiglie's hearts. Can't underestimate your combat prowess.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: A shame you're here alone.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: And what if she has backup?
What‚Äî?
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Lavinia, are you alright?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leon?!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Why, if it isn't Nuova Volsinii's very own celebrity, Signor Leontuzzo.
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Or should I call you Representative Leontuzzo now?
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Whatever you want.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: How did you‚Äî
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I heard you were planning to pick up Rubio's body, so I placed some people here to keep an eye out.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Go, Lavinia. I have a rough idea of what's going on, so leave it to me. The girl...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Only you can save her.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leontuzzo. What difference does it make, you being here?
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: I came prepared, of course.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: *tch* So Texas is here too...
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Stop them!
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: This way.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Grazie.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The crossbow bolt nails Teresa's clothes down.
Luna's eyes are glued to her, but a smile remains on the woman's face.
Pretty good shot. You must have pictured this moment in your head so many times, huh?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Shut up.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: If only you could see yourself now, my dear.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: When I looked into your eyes, I just knew. You're truly one of us.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: No, that's not it. Rather, is there anyone who isn't one of us?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Does that judge truly think she's any less base, less filthy than we are?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: How much blood does she have on her hands?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: And your father, what a beautiful speech he gave.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: But how many deaths did he turn a blind eye to?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: I don't believe it, ragazzina. What makes them think they can build a clean house with dirty hands?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Padre's hands are clean, and so are Lavinia's!
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I won't let you insult them again!
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Luna keeps her crossbow aimed at Teresa, but the clerk does not flinch one bit.
Insult?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: I'm only stating the facts.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: If you truly hate the famiglia that drove Rubio to his death...
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Then this is your chance.
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: What's wrong, are you scared?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Is that all your feelings for your father amount to?
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: SHUT UP!!!
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Luna, stop!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: A sharp crossbow bolt pierces through Lavinia's shoulder.
La... vinia...?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Wh-Why...?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I... I‚Äôm sorry...
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Lavinia?! What are those men doing‚Äî
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Clerk Teresa

attributes.content: Calm down, Luna. And put your weapon down too.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia covers her shoulder and slowly but surely approaches the girl.
Luna recoils in panic, but doesn't know where to run.
She insulted padre. She said he died for nothing.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: She insulted you too. Said everything you do is meaningless.
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: She deserves to die, just like all the mafiosi!
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: People like her will be punished in the end.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But if you kill her now, everything will be over.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The books you borrowed from me, aren't you reading them because you wanted to be a person who can judge others fairly?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I know!
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: But, but‚Äî!
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I dream of Pap√† every day, and I dream of that gunshot!
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I don't know what to do!
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I study so hard so I can forget, but I can't!
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I CAN'T!!!
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: ...Who could forget?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But the last thing your father would want is for you to act on impulse and forget what we should do, and where we should go.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: He waited decades for his one and only chance.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: He may not want you and I to walk the same path, but I can't just stand by and watch you stain your hands with blood.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But I can't help it. There's no way I can...
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I can't wait that long...
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I want everyone to know padre wasn't the kind of person they think he was...
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: That day will come, Luna. I promise you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: And until it does, I'll always be by your side.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Even if I'm the last person in this land to believe in your father's words. I'll keep the faith and fight for it.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Because I share the same dream.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia walks over to Luna and cradles the crying child in a tight embrace.
When you can't take it anymore, just come find me.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'll listen to your complaints; I'll cry with you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: And when you're older, we can drink a little vino together as we complain to one another, and bear each other's troubles when we can't handle them alone.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I... Can I really?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Of course. But you must promise me you will learn patience.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You must try to hold it in against anything that angers you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Alright?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I wanted to, I really, wanted to, but, but... I'm so..s-sorry‚Äî*sob* Waaaaah!!!!
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: I know, I know.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The crossbow drops to the floor, and the hands that were holding it grab onto Lavinia instead.
Tears well up once more, but this time they wash away the anger and hate.
After a long time, the crying finally stops.
Lavinia wipes away Luna's tears, and carries the unconscious Teresa out the door with the girl by her side.
As they walk, she suddenly seems to recall something, and says‚Äî
...I'm sorry, Luna.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Whether it's me or your father, consciously or otherwise, we've been asking you to become what we want you to be.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I've met enough people to know that justice and righteousness... are not the only paths one can take.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But‚Äî
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: A long time ago, when I had just started working...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I was the same as you, hoping I could knock some sense into the famiglie. I wanted to let them know they can't do as they please.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Then one day, I found myself at the entrance of an alley.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: If not for someone stopping me from going in, I may have died in that very alley.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That person presented me with a box containing the glove and hammer I wield now.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Back then, I thought that if I hid behind him... I might not be able to stand up for myself for the rest of my life.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: So I took the weapon he gave me and walked ahead of him.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Now that I'm recalling all this, I think that's what he hoped I'd do. And he'd also hope I would do this today.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Mafiosi always treat death like it is inevitable, as merely the result of solving a problem.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: This cycle of violence is how they live and survive.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Long, long ago, a bunch of people walked in the rain into an alley with no lights. They would either die in there, or come out with blood on their hands.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Then, they went further, deeper into the alley, and gradually forgot why they were there in the first place. And in the end, they saw that narrow alley as a full-width street.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Siracusa is a labyrinth of narrow alleys, even dead ends.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The people living inside the maze don't have many choices to make.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: If the choice was between people like me or the famiglie, I'd rather insist on keeping you by my side.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But you don't have to become me, and I'm not hoping for that either.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'd much rather be able to take you outside this labyrinth entirely.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: What's outside of it?
attributes.name: Luna

attributes.content: Roads. Many wide open roads.
attributes.name: Lavinia
